thread.title: Aracelis

author: Aracelis
title: Aracelis
text: This person helped me fine the right deal for my family. I moved in to my new address since August of last year and struggled to find internet and cable. She made it easier for me. I should have done this sooner. I'm glad that I found this place to help me when I did. She was kind and helped me with all I needed. My children will be very happy when they get home, even happier when we get services hooked up. One happy family, thank you very much.
